creditline: Gift of David Laird and Helen Lauritzen Laird
culture: Tindé Indé (Jicarilla Apache) and Na'isha Indé (Plains Apache)
description: torso and head of sketchy figure with long deer-like antlers, in green and rust red with white areas on face, holding a rounded green vessel with a round mouth; swirling green, dark orange and rust colored elements around figure
life_date: American (Tindé Indé (Jicarilla Apache) and Na'isha Indé (Plains Apache)), born 1959
markings: LLC below image, in white: [11/60]; LRC below image, blindstamp: [(open hand design)]
provenance: Helen and David Laird, Marshfield, Wis.; given to MIA, 2014
signed: bottom center below image, in white: [Instinctual Portrait]; LRC below image, in white: [Darren]
title: Instinctual Portrait
